casebody.head_matter:
437 A.2d 942
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Geraldine LUCAS, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Oct. 19, 1981.
Decided Dec. 17, 1981.
F. Emmet Ciccone, Philadelphia, court-appointed, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Alan Sacks, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
